item.title: Jennifer Lopez on Filming ‘Kiss of the Spider Woman’ Musical Numbers in One Take: ‘F— Me! I Better Get It Right Then’
item.description: Jennifer Lopez had her sights on landing the starring role in the 1996 movie adaptation of the musical “Evita.” “I went to audition for ‘Evita’ for [director] Alan Parker,” Lopez said Wednesday night

item.title: Nashville Film Festival Books ‘Kiss of the Spider Woman,’ Colin Hanks’ Doc ‘John Candy: I Like Me’
item.description: The 56th annual fest is scheduled to take place Sept. 18-24.
